thread.title: Clash of Clans Upcoming Update Brings Town Hall Level 11, New Hero, and Defense
thread.title_full: Clash of Clans Upcoming Update Brings Town Hall Level 11, New Hero, and Defense - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Clash of Clans Upcoming Update Brings Town Hall Level 11, New Hero, and Defense
text: Now it's a good time to be a Clash of Clans addict, as developer Supercell recently shown the new features the game will get in the next major update. Although we don't have an exact release date for this update, we believe the next big update for Clash of Clans will be launched in the next couple of weeks. During “ClashCon” that recently took place in Helsinki, Finland, developer Supercell unveiled some of the new gameplay features that will be included in the said upda... »
